reviewtext: Don't you just love when plug n play really works the way that it is supposed to?  It took all of two minutes to pop this reliable performer into my WinXP machine.  XP immediately recognized it upon bootup;  I didn't even need to use the driver CD that came with the card.Performance since then has been exactly what I expected with no hiccups.PROS*  True plug-n-play setup*  Hassle-free configuration and solid performance*  Price - under $$$ with the current manufacturer's rebateCONS*  Linksys registration requires the serial number which is only on the card itself - write it down before installation
